Excuse me?

On July 1st, 1867,
the provinces of New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Canada were declared the Dominion of Canada,

translation.en: [George] Canada.
Yeah, I can do that.
Thanks.
I don't think we've ever had a proper conversation before.
translation.it: Non abbiamo mai parlato davvero, prima.

translation.en: Becoming friends. All right, up top!
-Okay. -All right.
-Brunch on Thursday. -No, thank you.
Friday?
I think you should take up capoeira. I'm sorry, but I really do.
translation.it: Dovresti fare capoeira. Mi dispiace, ma lo penso.

translation.en: Oh my God. You're like a prophet.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Sei come un profeta.

translation.en: Thank you so much. I gotta go, but I'm gonna call you.
translation.it: Grazie mille. Devo andare, ma ti chiamo.

translation.en: Or... actually, do you want to be my sponsor? I don't think I really need the meetings.
translation.it: Anzi... mi faresti da sponsor? Non credo mi serva il gruppo.

translation.en: -No. Neither do I. -But maybe we can hang out and that would be the same thing?
translation.it: - Neanch'io. - Ma potremmo uscire e sarebbe lo stesso.

translation.en: Yeah. Anytime. Night or day.
And remember, throw your past in the bin and just... -[both] Stay busy. -[laughing]
translation.it: E ricorda, getta il passato e tieniti impegnata!

translation.en: -Bye. -Yeah.
[George] Wait, what do you mean you're not going back?
translation.it: Che vuoi dire che non torni?

translation.en: I'm just not going back.
-They only had eggs. It was bullshit. -Oh.
Oh, wow. Yeah. That's so cool.
You're such a rebel. Mae, you're like James Dean.
translation.it: Sei una vera ribelle. Mae, sei come James Dean.

translation.en: Okay, but check it out. I got a sponsor.
translation.it: Ok, ma senti un po'. Ho uno sponsor.

translation.en: I met this weird woman and she said I just need to stay busy instead.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto una tipa strana. Basta tenermi impegnata.

translation.en: Wait.
Do you actually think I look like James Dean?
Mae, I...
Isn't the first rule of these meetings accepting that you have a problem?
translation.it: La prima regola non è proprio accettare di avere un problema?

translation.en: I had a problem and now I have you.
translation.it: Avevo un problema e ora ho te.

translation.en: You can't just have me. Okay? I don't just have you.
translation.it: Non puoi solo avere me. Ok? Io non ho solo te.

translation.en: I have work and I have my friends and I...
translation.it: Ho il lavoro, ho i miei amici e...

translation.en: -Yeah. -[George] What?
What is that?
[exhales sharply] All right.
How come I've never met any of your friends?
translation.it: Com'è che non ho mai incontrato i tuoi amici?

translation.en: She makes a good point.
I'm sorry, can we not have this conversation in front of Phil, please?
translation.it: Possiamo non avere questa conversazione davanti a Phil?

translation.en: I'm going to introduce you when I'm ready.
Okay? But this conversation is about you, actually.
translation.it: Ok? Ma questa conversazione riguarda te.

translation.en: Well, maybe I didn't tell you about it 'cause I didn't think you'd get it.
translation.it: Non te ne ho parlato perché non pensavo avresti capito.

translation.en: We've had very different lives, and you grew up, like, in a bag of feathers.
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto vite molto diverse e tu sei cresciuta in una sacca di piume.

translation.en: Oxford, actually. I grew up in Oxford. You ever heard of it?
translation.it: Sono cresciuta a Oxford. Ne hai mai sentito parlare?

translation.en: Maybe I'd get it if you explained it, but you don't, okay? So I have to,
translation.it: Magari capirei, se me lo spiegassi, ma non lo fai. Quindi devo...

translation.en: like, root around in all of your stuff.
translation.it: frugare fra tutte le tue cose.

translation.en: -You went through my stuff? -Yes!
translation.it: - Hai frugato tra le mie cose? - Sì!

translation.en: It says here that you wrote this in hospital.
translation.it: Qui dice che l'hai scritto in ospedale.

translation.en: And that you owe someone called "Ink Boy" $800.
translation.it: E che devi 800 dollari a un tizio detto "ragazzo dell'inchiostro".

translation.en: Oh, and what is this? Is this, like, a drugs hat?
translation.it: E questo cos'è? È un cappello per la droga?

translation.en: Mae, where are you going?
Oh, my God.
I don't...
What the fuck was that?
New me.
New life.
I have everything under control.
Said every junkie ever.
-Oh, Mae, I... -[Mae sniffles]
God, why do you have to be so intense?
translation.it: Dio, perché devi essere così intensa?

translation.en: I am not...
intense.
I'm sorry.
So I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing.
I'm jizzing like a goddamn machine gun.
-Jizz, jizz, jizz! -[audience laughing]
Why did you book this terrible man?
That's Pete.
People love Pete.
If they like him, they are not gonna like me.
translation.it: Se amano lui, non ameranno me.

translation.en: Ah, well, you'd be surprised. People are mad.
translation.it: Sarai sorpresa. La gente è gasata.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
[Nick] You're up next.
Where you been in my life, baby?
What is this?
-Do you like it? It's my new gimmick. -[audience cheering]
translation.it: Ti piace? È la mia nuova trovata.

translation.en: [Pete] Fuck yeah! I'm a fucking king! Whoo!
translation.it: Sì! Sono un cazzo di re!

translation.en: Who's this guy?
So Monday, Wednesday, Friday, I bring in my packed lunch.
translation.it: Lunedì, mercoledì e venerdì ho il pranzo al sacco.

translation.en: -I have my usual, which is... -Ham.
Ham. Then Tuesday, Thursday, I go into the cafeteria.
translation.it: Prosciutto. Martedì e giovedì vado in mensa.

translation.en: What do you think they're serving on both days this particular week?
translation.it: Cosa credi che servano, entrambi i giorni di questa settimana?

translation.en: -Ham? -[laughing] Ham!
So that's Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday.
Ham, ham, ham, ham, ham!
I'm seeing someone. Sorry.
Okay.
Well, I feel like a regular old ham head.
translation.it: Mi sento una testa di prosciutto.

translation.en: What's his name? Um, Jonathan Crenshaw.
-Jonathan Crenshaw. -Yeah.
Well, you know. When the cat's away,
translation.it: Beh, sai. Quando il gatto non c'è,

translation.en: the mice hit the town and... I don't remember the exact saying, but--
translation.it: i topi vanno in città e... Non ricordo esattamente il detto, ma...

translation.en: -[new song starts] -Oh shit! This is me!
Fuck off, Jared!
Hi.
Hi.
What do you wanna know?
Everything.
I got addicted to coke when I was a kid and my parents kicked me out.
translation.it: Da piccola, ero diventata dipendente dalla coca e i miei mi cacciarono di casa.

translation.en: I sold drugs, I overdosed, I went to jail.
translation.it: Ho spacciato, sono andata in overdose e in prigione.

translation.en: I just really,
really want it to be over.
Okay.
-Really? -Yeah.
Cool.
Is there anything else we need to talk about?
Like... did you wanna tell me about your friends and why--
translation.it: Come... i tuoi amici e perché...

translation.en: Why don't you just go down on me?
Okay, that sounds good. Yeah.
